name: SAPRFC - E. Koucky - Follow Up - Bangert
short_description:
SAPRFC Connector - PHP5.3.14-NTS-VC9-Winx32 - for  SAP RFCSDK 7.20 (contained in SAP GUI 7.20) - working in Zend-Server-CE-5.6  SP4 and all other PHP 5.3.14 NTS installations.

------------------------------
You can use Zend-Server-CE 5.6 SP1 together with PHP 5.3.09 (see PHP 5.3.09) and SAP GUI 7.2
http://www.zend.com/de/download/513
or 
you can use Zend-Server-CE 5.6 SP4 together with PHP 5.3.14 (see PHP 5.3.14) and SAP GUI 7.2
http://www.zend.com/de/download/512 .
-----------------------------

**A compilation for SAP GUI 7.3 together with PHP 5.4.16 ..... is coming soon.**
**A compilation for SAP Manufacturing Execution SDK 2.0.2  . is coming soon.**
**A compilation for the new SAP NetWeaver RFC SDK .......... is coming soon.**
**SAP note 27517 - classic SAP RFC SDK support is ending ....... 31.03.2016.**

So soon you will be able to use Zend-Server-CE 6.1.0  together with PHP 5.4.16 and SAP GUI 7.3
https://www.zend.com/de/download/710 .

OK - 5.5 - 5.6 - may 2015
